pr_title: discord: Update activity message while playing PVP or DMM

timeline.bodyText: Deadman is still a PVP world type. Why is this removed?
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: Well it can be left, but the deadman check comes before the PVP world check. So if they're in a deadman world, PVP_WORLD_TYPES will never be checked.
replies.author: rangvaldr

replies.bodyText: isPvpWorld is used outside of the discord plugin, so this would cause adverse effects for other plugins.
replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: This can be replaced by Client.getWorldType().contains(WorldType.DEADMAN) since there is only one deadman world type.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: Well if you were okay with just hiding the activity completely, similar to PVP, no changes would be necessary. But in #11430 you had mentioned adding the activity line "Playing Deadman Mode", which is what's implemented here and does require the additional changes. If you just want to hide the activity, feel free to close the PR.
